long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ceptin Dark Mode Toggle is your perfect companion for switching any webpage between dark mode and light mode effortlessly. Enjoy a more comfortable browsing experience with features like:

🔄 Instant Toggle: Seamlessly switch between dark and light modes with a single click.
🎨 Customizable Appearance: Intelligent color adaptation for an optimal and readable dark mode.
🚀 Lightweight and Fast: Minimal impact on browser performance, ensuring smooth functionality.
🌍 Global Control: Works across all websites and tabs in your browser.
👁️ Reduce Eye Strain: Perfect for night-time browsing or reducing screen brightness.
Switch to Ceptin Dark Mode Toggle today and experience browsing the way you want—day or night!
